name: Junior Brown
description: '''Jamieson "Junior" Brown''' (born June 12, 1952) is an American [[country music|country]] guitarist and singer. He has released twelve studio albums in his career, and has charted twice on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs|country singles charts]]. Brown's signature instrument is the "guit-steel" [[double neck guitar]], a hybrid of electric guitar and [[lap steel guitar]].
